ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Why are you not helping one another?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: What is the matter with you that you do not help each other?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: How is it that you are not helping one another?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will be asked, "Why do you not help each other?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “What is the matter with you, that you do not help one another?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: What is the matter with you Why do you not help one another"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: What is the matter with you that you do not help each other?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Why help you not one another?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: What aileth you that ye help not one another?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But what is the matter with you that you cannot help one another?,'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: What aileth you that ye succour not one another?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘Why is it that you do not support one another [today]?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: What is the matter with you that ye help not each other?'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: What is the matter with you? Why do you not help one another (as you used to do in the world)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Why do you not help one another?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: What is the matter with you? Why do you not help one another?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [They will be asked], "What is [wrong] with you? Why do you not help each other?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:25] “What is wrong with you that you do not help one another?”, as was the case with you in this world. And it will be said to them:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (What aileth you that ye help not one another?) how is it that you do not save yourselves from Allah's chastisement, or help one another to avoid Allah's chastisement?
